Nick Gall wrote:

> 
> Plus, I just don't like words with the word HATE in them. :-)
> 

+1.  I swear, the only place I know of where folks insist that
conjunctions rate an acronym character, is this list!  Which is why I
stubbornly insist on using "HEAS", which stands for Hypermedia as the
Engine of Application State.  Like in a book title, only the important
words rate capitalization, let alone elevation to acronym status.

-Eric
